entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snowshower, -4.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 08:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 89 %

Dewpoint: -5.7°C

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries late this morning and early this afternoon. Periods of light snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending after midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023
